GSD.description:
btrfs: qgroup: fix sleep from invalid context bug in btrfs_qgroup_inherit()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.301 by commit 3c98e91be6aea4c7acf09da6eb0c107ea9186bb5. For more details please see the references link.
